name: The BadLands: Episode 1- Copperhead (ALPHA)
description:
"Copperhead: Episode 0" visual novel that potrays the life of the "Copperhead" Scott Burkhart.  Episode 0 is merely a prologue with 2 seperate endings that will effect the storyline of the planned series.
